# TEST seg-import -h
Usage: 
  seg-import bed inputFile(s)
  seg-import chain inputFile(s)
  seg-import [-c | -i] genePred inputFile(s)
  seg-import gff inputFile(s)
  seg-import [-c | -i] gtf inputFile(s)
  seg-import maf inputFile(s)
  seg-import psl inputFile(s)
  seg-import sam inputFile(s)

Read segments or alignments in various formats, and write them in SEG format.

Options:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
  -c          get CDS (coding regions)
  -i          get introns

# TEST seg-import -c gtf sp.gtf
240	Chromosome_2.1	108907	SPAC11D3.01c_T0	-288
